code: export var learners=[{question:'How do I sign up?',answer:'The app is still in development but we would be granting early access to our beta version sometime soon. If you want to be part of the very first set of people to use the app, click here to book your early access seat.'},{question:'How long are the courses?',answer:"We know it's hard to stay focused for a long time without zoning out so we are making sure that the duration is long enough for you to actually learn something but short enough to be within your attention span. That being said, each lessons would be within 15 - 40 minutes."},{question:'How does Memoryze work?',answer:"Think of Memoryze as an audio streaming platform you use to listen to music and podcasts.The only difference is this time, you'll be listening to people teach and explain topics and concepts."},{question:'Can anything really be taught through audio?',answer:'There are obviously some fields of study that are very practical and require hands-on application. Nonetheless, every area of interest still has essay-like, theoretical aspects that we believe can be taught via audio. So to answer the question, yes, anything can be taught via audio, although, in varying degrees.'},{question:'Would the app be free?',answer:'In the future, we might include some monetization features but for now, the app is free.'},{question:'Would there be certificates at the end of a course?',answer:'That would be at the total discretion of each educator.'},{question:'What does "Alpha feature" mean?',answer:"It means the feature isn't available until after the beta testing phase is over"}];export var educators=[{question:'How long are the courses?',answer:"We don't want zoning out and losing interest in your lessons so it's best to make the duration 15-40 minutes"},{question:'How do I record my courses?',answer:'First, you have to sign up as an educator. After that, we will provide resources to help you create your course, using just your mobile phone.'},{question:'Who owns the rights to my courses?',answer:'You and only you own the rights to your courses.'},{question:'How do I get paid?',answer:'You get paid royalties per stream. However, courses would only be monetized after the app is out of beta phase and has fully launched.'},{question:'Do I have to pay any fee to become an educator?',answer:'Nope, becoming an educator is absolutely free.'},{question:'Will Memoryze promote my course?',answer:'We would help you out as you try to promote your courses but the success of your courses mostly up to you. Make sure you put effort in ensuring the quality is top-notch, the lessons are interesting and your promotional strategy is brilliant.'},{question:'What can I teach on Memoryze?',answer:'You can teach literally anything on Memoryze. It could be a language, an academic topic or life skills.'},{question:'Are there requirements my course must meet?',answer:"Yes, there are. You'll receive a course guideline when you sign up as an educator. In there, you will find the various requirements your course must meet for the sake of quality control."},{question:'What does "Alpha feature" mean?',answer:"It means the feature isn't available until after the beta testing phase is over"}];
